GE07hv_conpu:7280: vīṇāṃ gṛhītvā mahatīṃ kakṣāsaktāṃ sakhīm iva // HV_44.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7282: daṇḍī kamaṇḍaludharaḥ sākṣāc chakra ivāparaḥ // HV_44.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7288: gātā caturṇāṃ vedānām udgātā prathamartvijām // HV_44.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7289: [k: Ś1 K1 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2.4.5 ins. after 11ab, K4 after 9, D1 G1.3.5 after 11: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7292: sthito devasabhāmadhye saṃrabdho viṣṇum abravīt // HV_44.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7294: svaraiś ca saptabhir viṣṇuṃ jagau vipraḥ sa nāradaḥ | *HV_44.12*554:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7295: ṣaḍjaṃ prathamam āvidhya ṛṣabhaṃ ca tataḥ param || *HV_44.12*554:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7297: pañcamaṃ ca tataḥ kurvan niṣādaṃ tadanantaram || *HV_44.12*554:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7298: kākalīṃ ca vimātrāṃ tu tato dve ca śrutī prabho | *HV_44.12*554:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:7299: tisras tisras tathā rājaṃl layaiś ca saha sarvaśaḥ || *HV_44.12*554:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:7301: taiś cāpi saptabhir vācyaṃ vācakaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ | *HV_44.12*554:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:7303: etaiḥ saptabhir ādyeśaṃ vicinvan prabhavaṃ tathā | *HV_44.12*554:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:7304: evaṃ samāpya geyaṃ tu vākyam etad uvāca ha | *HV_44.12*554:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:7305: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ viṣṇo yad idaṃ tridaśaiḥ kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:7306: kṣayāya pṛthivīndrāṇāṃ sarvam etad akāraṇam // HV_44.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7307: yad etat pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ sthitaṃ tvayi vidhīśvara /
GE07hv_conpu:7309: na yuktaṃ jānatā deva tvayā tattvārthadarśinā /
GE07hv_conpu:7310: devadeva pṛthivyarthe prayoktuṃ kāryam īdṛśam // HV_44.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7311: tvaṃ hi cakṣuṣmatāṃ cakṣuḥ ślāghyaḥ prabhavatāṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7312: śreṣṭho yogavatāṃ yogī gatir gatimatām api // HV_44.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7313: devabhāgān gatān dṛṣṭvā kiṃ tvaṃ sarvāgrago vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7314: vasuṃdharāyāḥ sāhyārtham aṃśaṃ svaṃ nānuyuñjase // HV_44.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7316: jagatyāṃ saṃtariṣyanti kāryāt kāryāntaraṃ gatāḥ // HV_44.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7317: tad ahaṃ tvarayā viṣṇo prāptaḥ surasabhām imām /
GE07hv_conpu:7318: tava saṃcodanārthaṃ vai śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam // HV_44.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7319: ye tvayā nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:7320: teṣāṃ śṛṇu gatiṃ viṣṇo ye gatāḥ pṛthivītalam // HV_44.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7321: pūḥ pṛthivyāṃ samuditā mathurā nāma nāmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7323: madhur nāma mahān āsīd dānavo yudhi durjayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7325: ghoraṃ madhuvanaṃ nāma yatrāsau nyavasat tadā // HV_44.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7326: tasya putro mahān āsīl lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7329: trāsanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bale mahati tasthivān // HV_44.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7330: sa tatra dānavaḥ krīḍan varṣapūgān anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7333: rājyaṃ śāsati dharmajñe rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahe // HV_44.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7334: sa dānavo balaślāghī ghoraṃ vanam upāśritaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7335: preṣayām āsa rāmāya dūtaṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_44.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7336: viṣayāsannabhūto 'smi tava rāma ripuś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7337: na ca sāmantam icchanti rājāno baladarpitam // HV_44.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7339: jetavyā ripavaḥ sarve sphītaṃ viṣayam icchatā // HV_44.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7341: jetavyānīndriyāṇy ādau taj jaye hi dhruvo jayaḥ // HV_44.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7343: nayānām upadeśena nāsti lokasamo guruḥ // HV_44.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7345: balajyeṣṭhasya nṛpater nāsti sāmantajaṃ bhayam // HV_44.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7347: amitrāṇāṃ priyakarair mohair adhṛtir īśvaraḥ // HV_44.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7348: yat tvayā strīkṛte mohāt sabalo rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7349: naitad aupayikaṃ manye mahat te karma kutsitam // HV_44.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7351: prahṛtaṃ rākṣase nīce naiṣa dṛṣṭaḥ satāṃ vidhiḥ // HV_44.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7352: satām akrodhajo dharmaḥ śubhāṃ nayati sadgatim /
GE07hv_conpu:7353: yat tvayā nihato mohād dūṣitāś ca vanaukasaḥ // HV_44.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7354: sa eva rāvaṇo dhanyo yas tvayā vratacāriṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7355: strīnimittaṃ hato yuddhe grāmyān dharmān avekṣatā // HV_44.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7356: yadi te sa hataḥ saṃkhye durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7357: yudhyasvādya mayā sārdhaṃ mṛdhe yady asi vīryavān // HV_44.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7358: tasya dūtasya tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tattvavādinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7360: asad etat tvayā dūta kathitaṃ tasya gauravāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7361: yan māṃ kṣipasi doṣeṇa vedātmānaṃ ca susthiram // HV_44.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7362: yady ahaṃ satpathe mūḍho yadi vā rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7363: yadi vā me hṛtā bhāryā tasya kā paridevanā // HV_44.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7364: na vāṅmātreṇa duṣyanti sādhavaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7365: jāgarti ca yathā daivaṃ sadā satsv itareṣu ca // HV_44.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7366: kṛtaṃ dūtena yat kāryaṃ gaccha tvaṃ dūta māciram /
GE07hv_conpu:7369: tasya daityasya durbuddhe mṛdhe pratikariṣyati // HV_44.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7370: evam uktaḥ sa dūtas tu yayau saumitriṇā saha /
GE07hv_conpu:7372: sa śīghrayānaḥ saṃprāptas tad dānavavanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7373: cakre niveśaṃ saumitrir vanānte yuddhalālasaḥ // HV_44.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7374: tato dūtasya vacanāt sa daityaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7375: jaghane tad vanaṃ kṛtvā yuddhāyābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_44.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7376: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ saumitrer dānavasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7377: ubhayor eva dhṛtayoḥ śūrayo raṇamūrdhani // HV_44.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7379: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ // HV_44.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7380: atha saumitriṇā bāṇaiḥ pīḍito dānavo yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:7381: tataḥ sa śūlarahitaḥ paryahīyata dānavaḥ // HV_44.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7383: sa gṛhītvāṅkuśaṃ caiva devair dattavaraṃ raṇe | *HV_44.49*556:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7388: śiraś ciccheda khaḍgena lavaṇasya mahāmṛdhe // HV_44.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7389: [k: For 50cd, Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2(marg) Ds D4.5 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7390: aṅkuśaṃ caiva ciccheda daityasya ca śiro mahat | *HV_44.50*557 |
GE07hv_conpu:7391: sa hatvā dānavaṃ saṃkhye saumitrir mitranandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7392: tad vanaṃ tasya daityasya cicchedāstreṇa buddhimān // HV_44.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7393: chittvā vanaṃ sa saumitrir niveśam abhirocayat /
GE07hv_conpu:7394: bhavāya tasya deśasya purīṃ paramadharmavit // HV_44.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7395: tasmin madhuvanasthāne mathurā nāma sā purī /
GE07hv_conpu:7396: śatrughnena purā sṛṣṭā hatvā taṃ dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_44.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7406: kṣetrāṇi rasavanty asyāḥ kāle devaś ca varṣati // HV_44.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:7411: yamunāyās taṭe ramye mathurā nāma viśrutā | *HV_44.58*558:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7413: niviṣṭo viṣayaś caiva śūrasenas tato 'bhavat // HV_44.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:7416: tasya putratvam āpanno yo 'sauviṣṇo tvayā hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7421: bhayadaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ satpathād bāhyatāṃ gataḥ // HV_44.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:7423: yuktas tenaiva darpeṇa prajānāṃ lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_44.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:7426: sa kaṃsas tatra saṃbhūtas tvayā yuddhe parājitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7428: sa badhvā pitaraṃ rājā mathurām abhyarakṣata | *HV_44.66*559 |
GE07hv_conpu:7430: yo 'py asau hayavikrānto hayagrīva iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7431: keśī nāma hayo jātaḥ sa tasyaiva jaghanyajaḥ // HV_44.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:7433: vṛndāvane vasaty eko nṛṇāṃ māṃsāni bhakṣayan // HV_44.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:7435: gavām aritvam āpannaḥ kāmarūpī mahāsuraḥ // HV_44.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:7436: riṣṭo nāma diteḥ putro variṣṭho dānaveṣu yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7437: sa kuñjaratvam āpanno daityaḥ kaṃsasya vāhanaḥ // HV_44.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:7438: [k: For 70cd, K2-4 Ñ V B D (D6 om.) T3.4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7439: kuñjaratvam agād daityaḥ kaṃsasyaiva sa vāhanaḥ | *HV_44.70*560 |
GE07hv_conpu:7441: pralambo nāma bhūtvāsau vaṭaṃ bhāṇḍīram āśritaḥ // HV_44.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:7443: śikharo nāma balavān ya āsīd dānavarṣabhaḥ | *HV_44.71*561 |
GE07hv_conpu:7444: khara ity ucyate daityo dhenukaḥ so 'surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7445: ghoraṃ tālavanaṃ daityaś caraty utsārayan prajāḥ // HV_44.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:7446: varāhaś ca kiśoraś ca tāv ubhau dānavottamau /
GE07hv_conpu:7447: mallau raṅgagatau tau tu jātau cāṇūramuṣṭikau // HV_44.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:7448: yau tau mayaś ca tāraś ca dānavau dānavāntaka /
GE07hv_conpu:7449: prāgjyotiṣe tau bhaumasya narakasya pure ratau // HV_44.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:7450: ete daityā vinihatās tvayā viṣṇo nirākṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7451: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya bādhante bhuvi mānavān // HV_44.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:7453: tava prasādāt teṣāṃ vai dānavānāṃ kṣayo bhavet // HV_44.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:7454: tava te divi bibhyanti tvatto bibhyanti sāgare /
GE07hv_conpu:7455: pṛthivyāṃ bibhyati tvatto nānyasya tu kathaṃcana // HV_44.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:7457: divaś cyutasya daityasya gatir bhavati medinī // HV_44.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:7459: durlabhaṃ svargagamanaṃ tvayi jāgrati keśava // HV_44.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:7460: tad āgaccha svayaṃ viṣṇo gacchāva pṛthivītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7463: tāsu sṛṣṭās tvayā devāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti bhūtale // HV_44.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:7465: setsyate ca sa kāryārtho yasyārthe bhūmir āgatā // HV_44.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:7466: tvaṃ bhārate kāryagurus tvaṃ cakṣus tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7467: tad āgaccha hṛṣīkeśa kṣitau tāñ jahi dānavān // HV_44.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:7470: chapter 45, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of December 19, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7473: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_45.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7474: trailokyasya hitārthāya yan mā vadasi nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:7475: tasya samyakpravṛttasya śrūyatām uttaraṃ vacaḥ // HV_45.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7476: viditā dehino jātā mayaite bhuvi dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7477: yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ samāsthāya daityaḥ puṣyati vigraham // HV_45.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7479: keśinaṃ cāpi jānāmi daityaṃ turagavigraham // HV_45.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7481: ariṣṭaṃ caiva jānāmi daityaṃ vṛṣabharūpiṇam // HV_45.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7482: vidito me kharaś caiva pralambaś ca mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7483: sā ca me viditā vipra pūtanā duhitā baleḥ // HV_45.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7486: vidito me jarāsaṃdhaḥ sthito mūrdhni mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:7487: prāgjyotiṣapure cāpi narakaṃ sādhu tarkaye // HV_45.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7488: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D4 T3.4 ins. after 8, D2 cont. after *563: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7490: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D4 T3.4 cont., K Dn D1-3.5 T1.2 G M4 ins. after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7493: [k: T1.2 G M4 cont., M1-3 ins. after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7494: śiśupālaṃ ca jānāmi tau haṃsaḍimakau tathā | *HV_45.8*564:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7495: jānāmi pauṇḍraṃ sālvaṃ ca taṃ kālayavanaṃ tathā || *HV_45.8*564:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7496: ekalavyaṃ ca jānāmi ye cānye duṣṭacāriṇaḥ | *HV_45.8*564:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7497: tān sarvān nihaniṣyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā | *HV_45.8*564:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7498: mayy āsaktāṃ ca jānāmi bhāratīṃ mahatīṃ dhuram /
GE07hv_conpu:7499: tac ca sarvaṃ vijānāmi yathā sthāsyanti te nṛpāḥ // HV_45.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7500: kṣayo bhuvi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ śakraloke ca satkriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:7502: saṃpravekṣyāmy ahaṃ yogam ātmanaś ca parasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7503: saṃprāpya pārthivaṃ lokaṃ mānuṣatvam upāgataḥ // HV_45.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7504: kaṃsādīṃś cāpi tān sarvān vadhiṣyāmi mahāsurān /
GE07hv_conpu:7505: tena tena vidhānena yena yaḥ śāntim eṣyati // HV_45.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7506: anupraviśya yogena tās tā hi gatayo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:7507: amīṣām amarendrāṇāṃ hantavyā ripavo yudhi // HV_45.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7510: viniścayo hi prāg eva nāradāyaṃ kṛto mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7511: nivāsaṃ tu na me brahmā vidadhāti pitāmahaḥ // HV_45.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7512: yatra deśe yathā jāto yena veṣeṇa vā vasan /
GE07hv_conpu:7513: tān ahaṃ samare hanyāṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha // HV_45.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7515: nārāyaṇemaṃ siddhārtham upāyaṃ śṛṇu me vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7516: bhuvi yas te janayitā jananī ca bhaviṣyati // HV_45.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7517: yatra vai tvaṃ mahābāho jātaḥ kulakaro bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:7519: tāṃś cāsurān samutsādya vaṃśaṃ kṛtvātmano mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7520: sthāpayiṣyasi maryādāṃ nṛṇāṃ tan me niśāmaya // HV_45.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7521: purā hi kaśyapo viṣṇo varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7522: jahāra yajñiyā gāvaḥ payodāś ca mahāmakhe // HV_45.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7523: aditiḥ surabhiś cobhe dve bhārye kaśyapasya tu /
GE07hv_conpu:7524: pradīyamānā gās tās tu naicchatāṃ varuṇasya vai // HV_45.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7526: uvāca bhagavan gāvo guruṇā me hṛtā iti // HV_45.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7527: kṛtakāryo hi gās tās tu nānujānāti me guruḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7528: anvavartata bhārye dve aditiṃ surabhiṃ tathā // HV_45.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7529: mama tā hy akṣayā gāvo divyāḥ kāmadughā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7530: caranti sagārān sarvān rakṣitāḥ svena tejasā // HV_45.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7531: kas tā dharṣayituṃ śakto mama gāḥ kaśyapād ṛte /
GE07hv_conpu:7532: akṣayaṃ yāḥ kṣaranty agraṃ payo devāmṛtopamam // HV_45.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7533: prabhur vā vyutthito brahman gurur vā yadi vetaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7534: tvayā niyamyāḥ sarve vai tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_45.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7535: yadi prabhavatāṃ daṇḍo loke kāryam ajānatām /
GE07hv_conpu:7536: na vidyate lokaguro na syur vai lokasetavaḥ // HV_45.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7537: yathā vāstu tathā vāstu kartavye bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7538: mama gāvaḥ pratīyantāṃ tato gantāsmi sāgaram // HV_45.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7539: yas te 'tmā devatā gāvo yā gāvaḥ sa tvam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7540: lokānāṃ tvatpravṛttānām ekaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_45.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7541: trātavyāḥ prathamaṃ gāvas trātās trāyanti tā dvijān /
GE07hv_conpu:7544: gavāṃ kāraṇatattvajñaḥ kaśyape śāpam utsṛjam // HV_45.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7546: sa tenāṃśena jagatīṃ gatvā gopatvam eṣyati // HV_45.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7547: yā ca sā surabhir nāma yāditiś ca surāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7548: te 'py ubhe tasya vai bhārye saha tenaiva yāsyataḥ // HV_45.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7549: [k: K1(marg.).2.3 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.2.4.5 T3.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7550: tābhyāṃ saha sa gopatve kaśyapo bhuvi raṃsyate | *HV_45.33*565 |
GE07hv_conpu:7552: vasudeva iti khyāto goṣu tiṣṭhati bhūtale // HV_45.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7553: girir govardhano nāma mathurāyās tv adūrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7554: tatrāsau goṣu nirataḥ kaṃsasya karadāyakaḥ // HV_45.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7555: tasya bhāryādvayaṃ caiva aditiḥ surabhis tathā /

GE07hv_conpu:14536: prajāś carantu sukhinas tava deva prapālanāt | *HV_91.59*1064:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14537: nirvighnaṃ brāhmaṇā deva bhūyāsus tava śāsanāt | *HV_91.59*1064:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:14538: ityuktvā sā dadau tasmai kuṇḍale lokaviśrute | *HV_91.59*1064:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:14540: [h: HV (CE) chapter 92, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of march 19, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:14545: dadarśa dhanam akṣayyaṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca // HV_92.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14550: śayanāni mahārhāṇi tathā siṃhāsanāni ca // HV_92.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14552: dadarśa ca mahac chatraṃ varṣamāṇam ivāmbudam // HV_92.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14554: varuṇād āhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ narakeṇeti naḥ śrutam // HV_92.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14555: yādṛśaṃ tu gṛhe dṛṣṭaṃ narakasya dhanaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_conpu:14556: na vai rājñā kubereṇa na śakreṇa yamena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14557: ratnasaṃnicyas tādṛg dṛṣṭapūrvo na ca śrutaḥ // HV_92.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:14558: hate bhaume nisunde ca hayagrīve ca dānave /
GE07hv_conpu:14559: upaninyus tatas tāni ratnāny antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_92.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14561: keśavāya mahārhāṇi yāny arhati janārdanaḥ // HV_92.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14566: rucirābhiḥ patākābhir vasānā vividhāḥ kuthāḥ // HV_92.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14568: aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi deśajāś cottamā hayāḥ // HV_92.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14569: goṣu cāpi kṛto yāvat kāmas tava janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14571: āvikāni ca sūkṣmāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14574: vasu yat triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇādhigataṃ tvayā /
GE07hv_conpu:14577: tāni santīha sarvāṇi narakasya niveśane // HV_92.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14579: iti vijñāpitas tais tu dānavaiś ca janārdanaḥ | *HV_92.16*1065 |
GE07hv_conpu:14580: [k: N2 ins. after 16 an addl. colophon. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14581: sa tat sarvaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pratigṛhya parīkṣya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14582: sarvam āhārayāmāsa dānavair dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_92.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14583: tatas tad vāruṇaṃ chatraṃ svayam utkṣipya mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14587: tatra puṇyā vavur vātā hy abhavaṃś cāmalāḥ prabhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14598: nivasantyo yathā devyaḥ sukhinyaḥ kāmavarjitāḥ // HV_92.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14600: sarvāḥ kāṣāyavāsinyaḥ sarvāś ca niyatendriyāḥ // HV_92.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14602: sametya yadusiṃhasya sarvāś cakruḥ striyo 'ñjalīn // HV_92.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14603: narakaṃ nihataṃ jñātvā muraṃ caiva mahāsuram /
GE07hv_conpu:14604: hayagrīvaṃ nisundaṃ ca tāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ paryavārayan // HV_92.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14605: te cāsāṃ rakṣiṇo vṛddhā dānavā yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14608: sarvāsām eva saṃkalpaḥ patitvenābhavat tataḥ // HV_92.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:14610: saṃprahṛṣṭā mahābāhum idaṃ vacanam abruvan // HV_92.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:14611: satyaṃ bata purā vāyur ihāsmān vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:14612: sarvabhūtarutajñaś ca devarṣir api nāradaḥ // HV_92.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:14614: sa bhaumaṃ narakaṃ hatvā bhartā ca bhavitā hi saḥ // HV_92.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:14616: darśanena kṛtārthā hi vayam adya mahātmanaḥ // HV_92.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:14618: sarvāḥ kamalapatrākṣīr dṛṣṭyā vācā ca mādhavaḥ // HV_92.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:14622: śibikāṃ vahatāṃ tatra nirghoṣaḥ sumahān abhūt // HV_92.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14627: nyaṅkubhiś ca varāhaiś ca rurubhiś ca niṣevitam /
GE07hv_conpu:14630: jīvaṃjīvakasaṃghaiś ca barhibhiś ca nināditam // HV_92.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:14631: tad apy atibalo viṣṇur dorbhyām utpāṭya bhāsvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:14632: āropayāmāsa tadā garuḍe pakṣiṇāṃ vare // HV_92.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:14634: uvāha līlayā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ // HV_92.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:14636: dikṣu sarvāsu saṃhrādaṃ janayāmāsa pakṣirāṭ // HV_92.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:14638: saṃjahāra mahābhrāṇi vijahāra ca kānicit // HV_92.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:14640: yayau vātajavaḥ pakṣī janārdanavaśe sthitaḥ // HV_92.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:14643: viśveṣāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānāṃ ca narādhipa /
GE07hv_conpu:14644: bhrājamānāny atikrāmad aśvinoś ca paraṃtapaḥ // HV_92.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:14647: avatīrya sa tārkṣyāt tu dadarśa vibudhādhipam /
GE07hv_conpu:14648: prītaś caivābhyanandat taṃ devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ // HV_92.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:14649: pradāya kuṇḍale divye vavande taṃ tadācyutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14652: satyabhāmā ca paulomyā yathāvad abhinanditā // HV_92.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:14656: prītāsmi darśanād devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ karavāṇi te | *HV_92.52*1066:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:14657: diṣṭyā hato bhavatyā tu narako duṣṭacetanaḥ | *HV_92.52*1066:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:14658: ity uktā sā tadā devī kṛtam ity abravīc ca tām | *HV_92.52*1066:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:14659: vāsavo vāsudevaś ca sahitau jagmatus tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14660: adityā bhavanaṃ puṇyaṃ devamātur maharddhimat // HV_92.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:14663: tatas te kuṇḍale dattvā vavande tāṃ śacīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14664: janārdanaṃ puraskṛtya kama caiva śaśaṃśa tat // HV_92.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:14665: [k: For 55b, K2-4 N2.3 V B2 Dn Ds D1-5 T G M4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14667: vavande tāṃ śacībhartā mātaraṃ svāṃ puraṃdaraḥ | *HV_92.55*1067:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14668: aditis tau sutau prītyā pariṣvajyābhinandya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14669: āśirbhir anurūpābhir ubhāv abhyavadat tadā // HV_92.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:14670: paulomī satyabhāmā ca prītyā paramayā yute /
GE07hv_conpu:14671: agṛhṇītāṃ varārhāyā devyāś ca caraṇau śubhau // HV_92.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:14672: te cāpy abhyavadat premṇā devamātā yaśasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:14673: yathāvad abravīc caiva janārdanam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_92.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14676: [k: K2.4 N2.3 V B D ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14678: tava ceyaṃ varārohā nityaṃ ca priyadarśanā | *HV_92.59*1068:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14683: jarāṃ na yāsyati vadhūr yāvat tvaṃ kṛṣṇa mānuṣaḥ // HV_92.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:14688: sa dadarśa mahābāhur ākrīḍe vāsavasya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:14689: divyam abhyarcitaṃ caityaṃ pārijātaṃ mahādrumam // HV_92.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:14691: yam āsādya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm // HV_92.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:14693: utpāṭyāropayāmāsa viṣṇus taṃ vai mahādrumam // HV_92.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:14694: so 'paśyat satyabhāmāṃ ca divyām apsarasaṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14695: [k: K2 N2.3 V1.2 B Ds D2.4-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14697: tataḥ prāyād dvāravatīṃ vāyujuṣṭena vai pathā // HV_92.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:14698: śrutvā tad devarājas tu karma kṛṣṇasya vai tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:14699: anumene mahābāhuḥ kṛtaṃ karmeti cābravīt // HV_92.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:14701: pratasthe dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇo devalokād ariṃdamaḥ // HV_92.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:14705: pūjito devarājena dadṛśe yādavīṃ purīm // HV_92.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:14707: hatvā tu narakaṃ bhaumaṃ dattvā kuṇḍalam uttamam | *HV_92.69*1072:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:14708: hṛtvā taṃ pārijātaṃ ca praṇamya suramātaram | *HV_92.69*1072:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:14709: tathā karma mahat kṛtvā bhagavān vāsavānujaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14710: upāyād dvārakāṃ viṣṇuḥ śrīmān garuḍavāhanaḥ // HV_92.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:14711: [k: After this adhy. All Mss. (except S1 M1-3) ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 29). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14718: dadarśātha purīṃ kṛṣṇo dvārakāṃ garuḍe sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14721: [k: After 2a, Ñ2 V B Ds D5.6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14723: [k: Ñ2 V1 B DS D6 ins. (Dn D2.3.5 after the first occurrence of 8cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14725: [k: Ñ2 V1 B Dn Ds D5.6 ins. (T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 after 1073): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14728: priyam icchasi cet kartuṃ mahyaṃ śilpavatāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:14729: kṛṣṇapriyārthaṃ bhūyas tvaṃ kariṣyasi manoharām // HV_93.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:14731: kuruṣva vibudhaśreṣṭha yathā mama purī tathā // HV_93.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14732: yat kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu ratnabhūtaṃ prapaśyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:14733: tena saṃyujyatāṃ kṣipraṃ purī dvāravatī tvayā // HV_93.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14735: saṃgrāmān ghorarūpāṃś ca vigāhati mahābalaḥ // HV_93.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14736: tām indravacanād gatvā viśvakarmā purīṃ tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14740: tāṃ purīṃ dvārakāṃ dṛṣṭvā vibhunārāyaṇo hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14743: dvārakāṃ prati dāśārhaś citritāṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14749: babhau cāruparikṣiptā dvārakā dyaur ivāmbubhiḥ // HV_93.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:14759: sarvartukavanaṃ caiva bhāti raivatakaṃ prati // HV_93.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14761: bhāti bhārgavanaṃ caiva puṣpakaṃ ca mahad vanam // HV_93.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:14764: bhāti caitrarathaṃ caiva nandanaṃ ca mahad vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14765: ramaṇaṃ bhāvanaṃ caiva veṇumad vai samantataḥ // HV_93.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:14767: bhāti puṣkariṇī ramyā pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhārata // HV_93.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14775: āyasaiś ca mahācakrair dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14779: dviguṇopaniveśāṃ ca dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14782: striyo 'pi yasyāṃ yudhyeran kim u vṛṣṇimahārathāḥ // HV_93.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14783: vyūhānām uttamā mārgāḥ sapta caiva mahāpathāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14784: tatra vai vihitāḥ sākṣād vividhā viśvakarmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:14793: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14802: dadṛśe dvārakā cāru meghair dyaur iva saṃvṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:14803: sākṣād bhagavato veśma vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:14805: tāvad eva ca vistīrṇam aprameyaṃ mahādhanaiḥ // HV_93.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14807: yaś cakāra mahābhāgas tvaṣṭā vāsavacoditaḥ // HV_93.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:14809: meror iva gireḥ śṛṅgam ucchritaṃ kāñcanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:14810: rukmiṇyāḥ pravaraṃ vāsaṃ vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:14815: sa ca prāsādamukhyo yo jāmbavatyā vibhūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14816: prabhayābhyabhavat sarvāṃs tān anyān bhāskaro yathā // HV_93.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:14820: sāgarapratimas tiṣṭhan merur ity abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_93.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:14828: yaṃ viduḥ sarvabhūtāni param ity eva bhārata // HV_93.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:14830: mahiṣyā vāsudevasya bhūṣaṇaṃ teṣu veśmasu // HV_93.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:14832: atīva saumyaḥ so 'py āsīd viṣṭhitaḥ parvato yathā // HV_93.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:14834: mahiṣyā vāsudevasya ketumān iti viśrutaḥ // HV_93.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:14835: tatra prāsādamukhyo vai yaṃ tvaṣṭā vidadhe svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:14837: sa śrīmān virajo nāma vyarājat tatra suprabhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14841: ratnajālāni tatraiva tatra tatra niveśitāḥ // HV_93.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:14847: ādityapathagaṃ yat tu meroḥ śikharam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:14849: tad apy utpāṭya kṛṣṇārtham ānītaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:14852: pārijātas tu tatraiva keśavenāhṛtaḥ svayam // HV_93.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:14854: kṛṣṇasya yo 'bhyarakṣaṃs taṃ devāḥ pādapam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:14855: puṇḍarīkaśatair juṣṭaṃ vimānaiś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ // HV_93.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14860: sālās tālāḥ kadambāś ca śataśākhāś ca rohiṇāḥ // HV_93.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:14861: ye ca haimavatā vṛkṣā ye ca meruruhās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:14866: tasmin puravare nadyaḥ prasannasalilā hradāḥ // HV_93.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:14873: bahūvuḥ paramopetās tasyāṃ puryāṃ tu pādapāḥ // HV_93.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:14875: nivāsaś ca kṛtas tatra varāhamṛgapakṣiṇām // HV_93.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:14876: puryāṃ tasyāṃ tu ramyāyāṃ prākāro vai hiraṇmayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14878: tena te ca mahāśailāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14879: parikṣiptāni bhaumena vanāny upavanāni ca // HV_93.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:14901: babhūvuḥ paramopetā vāpyaś ca vikacotpalāḥ // HV_94.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14906: tatas taṃ pāṇḍuraṃ śaurir mūrdhni tiṣṭhan garutmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14907: prītaḥ śaṅkham upādhmāsīd dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam // HV_94.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14908: tasya śaṅkhasya śabdena sāgaraś cukṣubhe bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:14909: rarāsa ca nabhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ tac citram abhacat tadā // HV_94.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14911: viśokāḥ samapadyanta garuḍasya ca darśanāt // HV_94.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14914: tatas tūryapraṇādaś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14915: siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe sarveṣāṃ puravāsinām // HV_94.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14916: tataḥ sarve daśārhāś ca sarve ca kukurāndhakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14921: rohiṇī ca yathoddeśam āhukasya ca yāḥ striyaḥ // HV_94.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:14922: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ suparṇena svaṃ niveśanam abhyayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:14923: cacāra ca yathoddeśam īśvarānucaro hariḥ // HV_94.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14925: yathārhaṃ pūjayām āsa yādavān yādavarṣabhaḥ // HV_94.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14927: praviveśa gṛhaṃ śaurir ādāya maṇiparvatam // HV_94.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:14928: taṃ ca śakrasya dayitaṃ pārijātaṃ mahādrumam /
GE07hv_conpu:14929: praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ pradyumno rukmiṇīsutaḥ // HV_94.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14933: praviveśa gṛhaṃ śrīmān vihitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_94.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14936: taṃ ca divyaṃ drumaśreṣṭhaṃ pārijātam amitrajit /
GE07hv_conpu:14937: arcyam arcitam avyagram iṣṭe deśe nyaveśayat // HV_94.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:14939: tāḥ striyaḥ pūjayām āsa saṃkṣiptā narakeṇa yāḥ // HV_94.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:14941: hāraiś candrāṃśusaṃkāśair maṇibhiś ca mahāprabhaiḥ // HV_94.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14945: pūrvam abhyarcitāś caiva vasudevena tāḥ striyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14946: vedakyā saha rohiṇyā revatyā cāhukena ca // HV_94.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14948: kuṭumbasyeśvarī tv āsīd rukmiṇī bhīṣmakātmajā // HV_94.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14952: ādideśa gṛhān kṛṣṇaḥ paribarhāṃś ca puṣkalān // HV_94.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14954: satyabhāmā sadā viṣṇoḥ pārśvasthā saṃsadi priyā | *HV_94.28*1082 |
GE07hv_conpu:14962: sakhivac copagṛhyainam anujajñe gṛhaṃ prati // HV_95.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:14963: so 'nujñāto hi satkṛtya praṇamya ca janārdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14964: ūrdhvam ācakrame pakṣī yatheṣṭaṃ gaganecaraḥ // HV_95.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14966: kṛtvā vegena mahatā yayau pūrvaṃ mahodadhim // HV_95.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:14967: kṛtyakāla upasthāsya ity uktvā garuḍe gate /
GE07hv_conpu:14968: kṛṣṇo dadarśa pitaraṃ vṛddham ānakaduṃdubhim // HV_95.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14969: ugrasenaṃ ca rājānaṃ baladevaṃ ca mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14970: kāśyaṃ sāṃdīpaniṃ caiva brahmagārgyaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_95.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14971: anyāṃś ca vṛddhān vṛṣṇīnāṃ tāṃś ca bhojāndhakāṃs tathā /

GE07hv_conpu:15334: eṣa vām ubhayor astu dāyādaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // HV_98.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15335: bṛhatyāṃ tu gadasyāhuḥ śaibyāyām aṅgadaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:15336: utpannaṃ kumudaṃ caiva śvetaṃ śvetāṃ tathāṅganām // HV_98.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15337: agāvahaḥ sumitraś ca śuciś citrarathas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15338: citrasenaḥ sute cāsya citrā citravatī tathā // HV_98.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15339: vanustambasya jajñāte stambaḥ stambavanaś ca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15340: [k: Ñ3 V B Dn D5.6 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15342: upāsaṅgasya tu sutau vajraḥ sukṣipra eva ca // HV_98.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15344: kāpālī garuḍaś caiva jajñāte citrayodhinau // HV_98.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:15345: [k: K1.3 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15347: ayutaṃ tu samākhyātaṃ vāsudevasya te sutāḥ || *HV_98.18*1105:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15350: pradyumnasya suto yas tu vaidarbhyāṃ rājasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15351: aniruddho raṇe yoddhā jajñe sa mṛgaketanaḥ // HV_98.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15354: sutanuś ca narācī ca śaurer āstāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15355: pauṇḍraś ca kapilaś caiva vāsudevasya tau sutau // HV_98.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15356: narācyāṃ kapilo jajñe pauṇḍraś ca sutanoḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15357: tayor nṛpo 'bhavat pauṇḍraḥ kapilaś ca vanaṃ yayau // HV_98.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15359: samādhisthaḥ sa bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvan mahāmatiḥ | *HV_98.22*1106:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15362: jarā nāma niṣādānāṃ prabhuḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām // HV_98.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15363: kāśyā supārśvaṃ tanayaṃ lebhe sāmbāt tarasvinam /
GE07hv_conpu:15367: sānor vajro 'niruddhasya vajras tv ādāv ajāyata // HV_98.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15368: vajrāj jajñe prativahaḥ sucārus tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15369: anamitrāc chinir jajñe kaniṣṭhād vṛṣṇinandanāt // HV_98.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15370: śines tu satyavāg jajñe satyakaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15371: satyakasyātmajaḥ śūro yuyudhānas tv ajāyata // HV_98.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15373: bhūmer yugaṃdharaḥ putra iti vaṃśaḥ samāpyate // HV_98.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15375: chapter 99, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of June 29 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15377: ya eṣa bhavatā pūrvaṃ śambaraghnety udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15378: pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ jaghne śambaraṃ tad bravīhi me // HV_99.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15385: jahāra kṛṣṇasya sutaṃ śiśuṃ vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15387: tato na nigṛhītaḥ sa dānavo yuddhadurmadaḥ // HV_99.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15389: dorbhyām utkṣipya nagaraṃ svaṃ jagāma mahāsuraḥ // HV_99.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15391: nāmnā māyāvatī nāma māyeva śubhadarśana // HV_99.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15392: dadau taṃ vāsudevasya putraṃ putram ivātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:15393: tasyā mahiṣyā nāthinyā dānavaḥ kālacoditaḥ // HV_99.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15394: [k: All Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15396: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktā punaḥ punar udaikṣata || *HV_99.7*1109:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15397: atha tasyā nirīkṣantyāḥ smṛtiḥ prādurbabhūva ha | *HV_99.7*1109:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15398: ayaṃ sa mama kānto 'bhūt smṛtvaivaṃ cānvacintayat || *HV_99.7*1109:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15399: ayaṃ sa nātho bhartā me yasyārthaṃ hi divāniśam | *HV_99.7*1109:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15400: cintāśokahrade magnā na vindāmi ratiṃ kvacit || *HV_99.7*1109:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15403: katham asya stanaṃ dāsye mātṛbhāvena jānatī | *HV_99.7*1109:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15404: bhartur bhāryā tv ahaṃ bhūtvā vakṣye vā putra ity uta || *HV_99.7*1109:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:15405: evaṃ saṃcintya manasā dhātryās taṃ sā samarpayat | *HV_99.7*1109:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15407: dhātryāḥ sakāśāt sa ca tāṃ śṛṇvan rukmiṇinandanaḥ | *HV_99.7*1109:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15408: māyāvatīm avijñānān mene svām eva mātaram | *HV_99.7*1109:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:15409: sā taṃ saṃvardhayām āsa kārṣṇiṃ kamalalocanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15410: māyāś cāsmai dadau sarvā dānavīḥ kāmamohitā // HV_99.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15411: sa yadā yauvanasthas tu pradyumnaḥ kāmadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15413: taṃ sā māyāvatī kāntaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:15414: iṅgitaiś cāpi vīkṣantī prālobhayata sasmitā // HV_99.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15415: prasajjantīṃ tu tāṃ devīṃ babhāṣe cāruhāsinīm /
GE07hv_conpu:15416: mātṛbhāvaṃ parityajya kim evaṃ vartase 'nyathā // HV_99.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15418: yā putrabhāvam utsṛjya mayi kāmāt pravartase // HV_99.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15419: nanu te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye ko 'yaṃ śīlavyatikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15420: tat tvam icchāmy ahaṃ devi kathitaṃ kas tv ayaṃ vidhiḥ // HV_99.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15422: yā nareṣu prasajjante nagāgreṣu ghanā iva // HV_99.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15423: yadi te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye yadi vā nātmajaḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_conpu:15424: kathitaṃ tat tvam icchāmi kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam // HV_99.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15425: evam uktā tu sā bhīruḥ kāmena vyathitendriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:15426: priyaṃ provāca vacanaṃ vivikte keśavātmajam // HV_99.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15427: na tvaṃ mama sutaḥ saumya nāpi te śambaraḥ pitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15428: rūpavān asi vikrāntas tvaṃ jātyā vṛṣṇinandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15429: putras tvaṃ vāsudevasya rukmiṇyā nandivardhanaḥ // HV_99.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15433: pitus te vāsudevasya dharṣayitvā gṛhaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15434: pākaśāsanakalpasya hṛtas tvaṃ śambareṇa ha // HV_99.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15435: sā ca te karuṇaṃ mātā tvāṃ bālam anuśocatī /
GE07hv_conpu:15436: atyarthaṃ śrāmyate vīra vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_99.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:15437: sa hi śakrād api mahān pitā te garuḍadhvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15438: iha tvāṃ nābhijānāti bālam evāpavāhitam // HV_99.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15439: kānta vṛṣṇikumāras tvaṃ na hi tvaṃ śambarātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15440: vīra naivaṃvidhān putrān dānavā janayanti hi // HV_99.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15441: tato 'haṃ kāmayāmi tvāṃ na hi tvaṃ janito mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:15442: rūpaṃ te saumya paśyantī sīdāmi hṛdi durbalā // HV_99.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15443: yan me vyavasitaṃ kānta yac ca me hṛdi vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:15444: tanme manasi vārṣṇeya pratisaṃdhātum arhasi // HV_99.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15445: eṣa te kathitaḥ saumya sadbhāvas tvayi yo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15446: yathā na mama putras tvaṃ na putraḥ śambarasya ca // HV_99.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15448: kāmadevaś ca vīra tvaṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi vai prabho | *HV_99.25*1110:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15449: śaṃkarasya ca śāpena tvam anaṅgagatiḥ purā || *HV_99.25*1110:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15450: tat kālamāyayā rūpaṃ kṛtvā daityasya veśmani | *HV_99.25*1110:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15451: viśīrṇā sāham uṣitā daityasyāsya ca veśmani | *HV_99.25*1110:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15453: cakrāyudhātmajaḥ kruddhaḥ śambaraṃ sa samāhvayat // HV_99.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15455: aṣṭamyāṃ nihato yuddhe māyayā kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15457: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ devīṃ svām agacchat purīṃ pituḥ // HV_99.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15459: ājagāma purīṃ ramyāṃ rakṣitāṃ tejasā pituḥ // HV_99.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15461: māyāvatyā saha tayā rūpavān iva manmathaḥ // HV_99.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15463: vismitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhīrāś caivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_99.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15464: tatas taṃ kāmasaṃkāśaṃ kāntayā saha saṃgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:15466: taṃ vrīḍitamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sajjamānaṃ pade pade /
GE07hv_conpu:15468: rukmiṇī tv eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā śokārtā putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:15470: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.3.5(marg.).6 T1.2.4 G M4 ins. (K1 D4 after 40): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15471: yādṛk svapno mayā dṛṣṭo niśāyā yauvane gate | *HV_99.34*1111:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15477: tayā punar ahaṃ gṛhya snāpitā rucirāmbunā || *HV_99.34*1111:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15479: mama mūrdhany upāghrāya dattā srak sā tayā mama || *HV_99.34*1111:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15481: sakhījanavṛtā devī kumāraṃ vīkṣya taṃ muhuḥ | *HV_99.34*1111:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15483: ity ato 'nantaraṃ tatra abravīd vākyam eva tat | *HV_99.34*1112 |
GE07hv_conpu:15484: dhanyāyāḥ khalv ayaṃ putro dīrghāyuḥ priyadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15485: idṛśaḥ kāmasaṃkāśo yauvane prathame sthitaḥ // HV_99.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15486: jīvaputrā tvayā putra kā sā bhāgyavibhūṣitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15487: kim arthaṃ cāmbudaśyāma sabhāryas tvam ihāgataḥ // HV_99.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15488: asmin vayasi suvyaktaṃ pradyumno mama putrakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15489: bhaved yadi na nītaḥ syāt kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_99.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15490: vyaktaṃ vṛṣṇikumāro 'yaṃ na mithyā mama tarkitam /
GE07hv_conpu:15491: vijñāto 'si mayā cihnair vinā cakraṃ janārdanaḥ // HV_99.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15492: mukhaṃ nārāyaṇasyeva keśāḥ keśānta eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:15493: mūrdhavakṣobhujais tulyo halinaḥ śvaśurasya me // HV_99.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15494: kas tvaṃ vṛṣṇikulaṃ sarvaṃ vapuṣā dyotayan sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15495: aho janārdanasyāsya divyā tvam aparā tanuḥ // HV_99.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15496: etasminn antare kṛṣṇaḥ sahasā praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15497: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śambarasya vadhaṃ prati // HV_99.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15498: so 'paśyat taṃ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ siddhaṃ manmathalakṣaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15499: snuṣāṃ māyāvatīṃ caiva hṛṣṭacetā janārdanaḥ // HV_99.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15500: so 'bravīt sahasā devīṃ rukmiṇīṃ devatām iva /
GE07hv_conpu:15501: ayaṃ te devi saṃprāptaḥ putraś cāpadharaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_99.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15503: hatā māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā yābhir devān abādhata // HV_99.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15504: satī ceyaṃ śubhā sādhvī bhāryā vai tanayasya te /
GE07hv_conpu:15506: mā ca te śambarasyeyaṃ patnīty evaṃ vyathā bhavet // HV_99.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:15507: manmathe tu gate nāśaṃ gate cānaṅgatāṃ purā /
GE07hv_conpu:15510: kāmapatnī hi kanyaiṣā kāmakāmā ratiḥ śubhā /
GE07hv_conpu:15511: māyārūpeṇa taṃ daityaṃ mohayaty asakṛc chubhā // HV_99.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15512: na caiṣā tasya kaumāre vaśe tiṣṭhati śobhanā /
GE07hv_conpu:15513: atmamāyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā śambaram āviśat // HV_99.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15514: patny eṣā mama putrasya snuṣā tava varāṅganā /
GE07hv_conpu:15516: praveśayaināṃ bhavanaṃ pūjyā hy eṣā snuṣā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15517: cirapranaṣṭaṃ ca sutaṃ bhajasya punarāgatam // HV_99.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15518: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5(marg.).6 T2.4 G M4 ins. (T1 after 49a): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15520: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ devī kṛṣṇenodāhṛtaṃ tadā | *HV_99.49*1114:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15521: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rukmiṇī vākyam abravīt || *HV_99.49*1114:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15523: adya me saphalaḥ kāmaḥ pūrṇaś cādya manorathaḥ | *HV_99.49*1114:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15525: āgaccha putra bhavanaṃ viśasva saha bhāryayā || *HV_99.49*1114:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15526: tato 'bhivādya caraṇau govindaṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ | *HV_99.49*1114:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15527: pradyumnaḥ pūjayām āsa halinaṃ ca mahābalam || *HV_99.49*1114:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15528: utthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya mūrdhny upāghrāya vīryavān | *HV_99.49*1114:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15530: snuṣāṃ cotthāpya tāṃ devīṃ rukmiṇī rukmabhūṣaṇāṃ | *HV_99.49*1114:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15532: sametaṃ bhavanaṃ patnyā śacyendram aditir yathā | *HV_99.49*1114:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15533: praveśayām āsa tadā rukmiṇī sutam āgatam | *HV_99.49*1114:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:15535: evam uktā tu kṛṣṇena rukmiṇī yoṣitāṃ varā | *HV_99.49*1115:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15536: putraṃ prītyā pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya tāṃ snuṣām | *HV_99.49*1115:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15537: gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa snuṣayā saha bhāminī | *HV_99.49*1115:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15539: chapter 100, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by André Couture, version of July 7 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:15542: tam eva māsaṃ sāmbas tu jāmbavatyām ajāyata // HV_100.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15544: rāmād anantaraṃ caiva mānitaḥ sarvavṛṣṇibhiḥ // HV_100.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:15546: rāmasyaiva priyasutaḥ so 'bhavaj jyeṣṭha ity api | *HV_100.2*1116 |
GE07hv_conpu:15547: jātamātre tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śubhaṃ tat puram āviśat /
GE07hv_conpu:15549: yādavīṃ ca śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāṃ śriyaṃ dveṣṭi vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15550: janārdanabhayāc caiva na śāntiṃ lebhire nṛpāḥ // HV_100.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15551: kasyacit tv atha kālasya pure vāraṇasāhvaye /
GE07hv_conpu:15552: duryodhanasya yajñe vai sameyuḥ sarvapārthivāḥ // HV_100.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15553: tāṃ śrutvā mādhavīṃ lakṣmīṃ saputraṃ ca janārdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15554: purīṃ dvārāvatīṃ caiva niviṣṭāṃ sāgarāntare // HV_100.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15556: śriyaṃ draṣṭuṃ hṛṣīkeśam ājagmuḥ kṛṣṇamandiram // HV_100.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15560: akṣauhiṇīḥ prakarṣanto daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūmipāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15563: viviśur yojanāḍhyāsu svāsu svāsv avanīṣv atha // HV_100.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15567: śārṅgaṃ ca dhanur ādāya kiṃ syād iti vicintayan | *HV_100.10*1117:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15573: kṛtvā siṃhāsane kṛṣṇaḥ kāñcane niṣasāda ha // HV_100.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15575: siṃhāsaneṣu citreṣu pīṭheṣu ca janādhipāḥ // HV_100.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15577: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca sadane brahmaṇo yathā // HV_100.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15579: idaṃ provāca bhagavān kṣatriyān draṣṭum āgatān | *HV_100.15*1118:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:15581: yad asmākaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhās tulyaṃ tad bhavatāṃ sadā | *HV_100.15*1118:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15582: gṛhyatāṃ vasu yad divyaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ || *HV_100.15*1118:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15584: teṣāṃ citrāḥ kathās tatra pravṛttās tatsamāgame /
GE07hv_conpu:15587: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣatriyās tadā | *HV_100.16*1119 |
GE07hv_conpu:15589: tumulaṃ durdinaṃ cāsīt savidyut stanayitnumat // HV_100.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15593: gāyann eva harīṃ sāmnā vasantaṃ yadusaṃsadi | *HV_100.16*1120 |
GE07hv_conpu:15599: āsanasthaṃ yaduśreṣṭam uvāca munir avyayaḥ // HV_100.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15600: āścaryaṃ khalu devānām ekas tvaṃ puruṣottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15601: dhanyaś cāsi mahābāho loke nānyo 'sti kaś cana // HV_100.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15602: evam uktaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pratyuvāca muniṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15603: āścaryaś caiva dhanyaś ca dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety aham // HV_100.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15604: evam ukto muniśreṣṭhaḥ prāha madhye mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:15606: taṃ prasthitam abhiprekṣya pārthivāḥ prāhur īśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:15607: guhyaṃ mantram ajānanto vacanaṃ nāraderitam // HV_100.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15608: āścarya ity abhihito dhanyo 'sīti ca mādhava /
GE07hv_conpu:15609: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ pratyukte 'pi ca nārade // HV_100.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15610: kim etan nābhijānīmo divyaṃ mantrapadaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15611: yadi śrāvyam idaṃ kṛṣṇa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_100.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15612: tān uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvān pārthivapuṃgavān /
GE07hv_conpu:15613: śrotavyaṃ nāradas tv eṣa dvijo vaḥ kathayiṣyati // HV_100.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15615: yat tvayābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ mayā ca pratibhāṣitam // HV_100.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15616: sa pīṭhe kāñcane śubhre sūpaviṣṭaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15617: prabhavaṃ tasya vākyasya pravaktum upacakrame // HV_100.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15618: śruyatāṃ bho nṛpaśreṣṭhā yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15619: asya praśnasya mahato yathā pāram ahaṃ gataḥ // HV_100.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15621: carāmy ekaḥ kṣapāpāye saṃdṛśyati divākare // HV_100.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:15626: so 'haṃ taṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā proktavāñ jalacāriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:15627: tvam āścaryaśarīro 'si kūrma dhanyaś ca me mataḥ // HV_100.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15628: yas tvam evam abhedyābhyāṃ kapālābhyāṃ samāvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15629: toye carasi niḥśaṅkaḥ kiṃ cid apy avicintayan // HV_100.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15630: sa mām uvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15631: kim āścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaś cāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho // HV_100.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15632: gaṅgeyaṃ nimnagā dhanyā kim āścaryam ataḥ param /
GE07hv_conpu:15633: yatrāham iva sattvāni caranty ayutaśo jale // HV_100.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15635: dhanyāsi tvaṃ nadīśreṣṭhe nityam āścaryadarśane // HV_100.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15636: yā tvam evaṃ mahādehaiḥ śvāpadair upaśobhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15637: hradinī sāgaraṃ yāsi rakṣantī tāpasālayān // HV_100.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15638: evam uktā tato gaṅgā rūpiṇī pratyabhāṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:15639: nāradaṃ devagandharvaṃ śakrasya dayitaṃ dvijam // HV_100.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15641: tava satye niviṣṭasya vākyaṃ māṃ pratibādhate // HV_100.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15643: yatrāham iva vistīrṇāḥ śataśo yānti nimnagāḥ // HV_100.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15645: āścaryaḥ khalu lokānāṃ dhanyaś cāsi mahārṇava /
GE07hv_conpu:15646: tena khalv asi yonis tvam ambhasāṃ salileśvaraḥ // HV_100.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15649: samudras tv evam uktas tu tato mām abravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15650: svaṃ jalaughatalaṃ bhittvā vyutthitaḥ pavaneritaḥ // HV_100.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15651: mā maivaṃ devagandharva nāsmy āś caryo dvijottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15652: vasudheyaṃ mune dhanyā yatrāham upari sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15653: ṛte tu pṛthivīṃ loke kim āścaryam ataḥ param // HV_100.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15655: kautūhalasam āviṣṭo hy abruvaṃ jagato gatim // HV_100.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:15656: dharitri dehināṃ yonir dhanyā khalv asi śobhane /
GE07hv_conpu:15657: āścaryā cāsi bhūteṣu mahatyā kṣamayā yute // HV_100.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15658: tena khalv asi lokānāṃ dharaṇī manujāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15659: kṣamā tvattaḥ prasūtā ca karma cāmbaragāminām // HV_100.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:15660: tato bhūḥ stutivākyena sā mayoktena lajjitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15661: vihāya sahajaṃ dhairyam atha māṃ pratyabhāṣata // HV_100.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:15663: nāsmi dhanyā na cāścaryā pārakyeyaṃ dhṛtir mama // HV_100.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:15664: ete dhanyā dvijaśrestha parvatā dhārayanti mām /
GE07hv_conpu:15665: eṣv āścaryāṇi dṛśyante ete lokasya setavaḥ // HV_100.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:15667: dhanyā bhanto dṛśyante bahvāścaryāś ca bhūdharāḥ // HV_100.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:15669: tena ratnākarāḥ sarve bhavanto bhuvi śāśvatāḥ // HV_100.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:15670: mama tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā parvatās tasthuṣāṃ varāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15671: ūcur māṃ sāntvayuktāni vacāṃsi vanaśobhitāḥ // HV_100.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:15672: brahmarṣe na vayaṃ dhanyā nāpy āścaryāṇi santi naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15675: nāś caryo vāpi dhanyo vā tasmāt parataro bhuvi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15676: vihāya taṃ mahādevaṃ nāsmān stotum ihārhasi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15677: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kailāsam aham āgataḥ | *HV_100.57ab*1121:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15678: dṛṣṭvā taṃ pārvatīśānam abruvaṃ vacanaṃ tadā || *HV_100.57ab*1121:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15680: āścaryo 'si bhavān eko dhanyas tvaṃ jagatīpate | *HV_100.57ab*1121:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15681: tvattaḥ parataro nāsti devo jagati kaś cana || *HV_100.57ab*1121:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15682: yad idaṃ dṛśyate deva bhuvanaṃ sacarācaram | *HV_100.57ab*1121:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15684: atha mām abravīd devo virūpākṣas trilocanaḥ | *HV_100.57ab*1121:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:15685: nāhaṃ dhanyo na cāścaryo naivaṃ māṃ vaktum arhasi | *HV_100.57ab*1121:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:15686: mattaḥ parataro jñeyo jagat sraṣṭā dvijottama | *HV_100.57ab*1121:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:15687: brahmā prajāpatir dhanyaḥ sa cāścaryaḥ sureṣv api // HV_100.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:15689: tasya vākyasya paryāyaṃ paryāptam iva lakṣaye // HV_100.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:15693: āścaryo bhagavān eko dhanyaś ca jagato guruḥ // HV_100.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:15694: na kiṃ cid anyat paśyāmi bhūtaṃ yad bhavatā samam /
GE07hv_conpu:15695: tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ jātaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam // HV_100.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:15697: bhavanti sarvadeveśa dṛśyaṃ sarvam idaṃ vapuḥ // HV_100.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:15698: tena khalv asi devānāṃ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15699: teṣāmevāsi yat sraṣṭā lokānām api saṃbhavaḥ // HV_100.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:15700: tato mām āha bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15701: dhanyāścaryāśritair vākyaiḥ kiṃ māṃ nārada bhāṣase // HV_100.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:15702: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ devā dhanyā devāś ca nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15703: ye lokān dhārayanti sma devās tattvārthadarśinaḥ // HV_100.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:15704: ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ satyam atharvaṇi ca yan matam /
GE07hv_conpu:15705: tanmayaṃ viddhi māṃ vipra dhṛto 'haṃ tair mayā ca te // HV_100.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:15710: dhanyā bhavantaḥ puṇyāś ca nityam āścaryaviśrutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15711: ādhārāś caiva viprāṇām evam āha prajāpatiḥ // HV_100.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:15713: yuṣmat parataraṃ nāsti śrutyā vā tapasāpi vā // HV_100.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:15714: pratūcus te tato vākyaṃ devā mām abhitaḥ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15715: āścaryāś caiva dhanyāś ca yajñāś cātmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_100.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:15716: yajñārthe tu vayaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ sṛṣṭā yena sma nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15717: tad asmākaṃ parā yajñā na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15718: svayaṃbhuvo 'pīha parā vedānāṃ ca parā gatiḥ // HV_100.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:15720: bho yajñāḥ paramaṃ tejo yuṣmāsu khalu lakṣyate /
GE07hv_conpu:15721: brahmaṇābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ yan me vedair iheritam // HV_100.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:15723: dhanyāḥ khalu bhavanto ye dvijātīnāṃ svavaṃśinaḥ // HV_100.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:15724: tena khalv agnayas tṛptiṃ puṣmābhir yānti tarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15725: bhāgaiś ca tridaśāḥ sarve mantraiś caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_100.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:15727: pratyūcur māṃ paraṃ vākyaṃ sarve yūpadhvajāḥ sthitāḥ // HV_100.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:15729: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇuḥ sa hy asmākaṃ parā gatiḥ // HV_100.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:15730: yad ājyaṃ vayam aśnīmo hutam agniṣu pāvanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15731: tat sarvaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo lokamūrtiḥ prayacchati // HV_100.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:15735: so 'haṃ viṣṇor gatiṃ prepsur iha saṃpatito bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:15736: dṛṣṭaś cāyaṃ mayā viṣṇur bhavadbhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ // HV_100.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:15737: yan mayābhihito hy eṣa tvam āścaryaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_conpu:15738: dhanyaś cāsīti bhavatāṃ madhyastho hy atra pārthivāḥ // HV_100.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:15740: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ paryāptaṃ vacanaṃ mama // HV_100.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:15741: yajñānāṃ hi gatir viṣṇuḥ sarveṣāṃ sahadakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15742: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ praśno mama samāptavān // HV_100.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:15744: sadakṣiṇe 'smin puruṣe tad vākyaṃ paryayāgatam // HV_100.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:15745: yan māṃ bhavantaḥ pṛcchanti vākyasyāsya vinirṇayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15746: tad etat sarvam ākhyātaṃ sādhayāmi yathāgatam // HV_100.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:15750: na ca nārāyaṇād anyat triṣu lokeṣu vidyate | *HV_100.85*1123:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15755: ity evam uktvā sa divaṃ jagāma ha | *HV_100.85*1123:8 |*
GE07hv_conpu:15756: nārade tu gate svargaṃ sarve te pṛthivīkṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15757: vismitāḥ svāni rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ sabalavāhanāḥ // HV_100.86 //

GE07hv_conpu:15762: dhanyo 'yaṃ nārado yasmād dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣād dhariḥ svayam || *HV_100.86*1124:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:15765: ko nāma viṣṇur ity evam anye mūḍhā narādhamāḥ | *HV_100.86*1124:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15767: iti tattvena vijñāya nṛpā nārāyaṇaṃ param | *HV_100.86*1124:9 |

GE07hv_conpu:15802: brūhi tattvena bhadraṃ te yady api syāt suduṣkaram // HV_101.10 //

GE07hv_conpu:16474: na ca svapnakṛto doṣo martyaloke 'sti sundari | *HV_107.33*1173:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16475: evaṃ viprarṣayo devi dharmajñāḥ kathayanti vai | *HV_107.33*1173:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16476: manasā caiva vācā ca karmaṇā ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16477: duṣṭā yā tribhir etais tu pāpā sā procyate bhuvi // HV_107.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:16478: na va te duṣyate bhīru manaḥ prajavitaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16479: kathaṃ tvaṃ doṣaduṣṭā vai niyatā brahmacāriṇī // HV_107.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:16480: yadi suptā satī sādhvī śuddhabhāvā manasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16481: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ naiva dharmo vilupyate // HV_107.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:16482: yasyā duṣṭaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ karmaṇā copapāditam /
GE07hv_conpu:16483: tām āhur asatīṃ nāma satī tvam asi bhāmini // HV_107.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:16485: imām avasthāṃ nītāsi kālo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_107.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:16487: kumbhāṇḍaduhitā vākyaṃ paramaṃ tv idam abravīt // HV_107.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:16489: tyaja śokaṃ viśālākṣi apāpā tvaṃ varānane | *HV_107.39*1174:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16490: smṛtaṃ me yad idaṃ vākyaṃ yāthātathyena tac chṛṇu | *HV_107.39*1174:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16491: uṣe yad uktā devyāsi bhartāraṃ dhyāyatī tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16492: samīpe devadevasya smara bhāmini tad vacaḥ // HV_107.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:16493: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya vaiśākhe māsi yo niśi /
GE07hv_conpu:16494: harmye śayānāṃ rudatīṃ strībhāvam upaneṣyati // HV_107.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:16495: bhavitā sa hi te bhartā śūraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16496: ity uvāca tato hṛṣṭā devī tava manogatam // HV_107.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:16497: na hi tad vacanaṃ mithyā pārvatyā yad udāhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16498: tattvaṃ kim idam atyarthaṃ rodiṣīndunibhānane // HV_107.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:16499: ity evam uktā vacanaṃ smṛtvā devīvacas tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16500: abhavan naṣṭaśokā sā bāṇaputrī śubhekṣaṇā // HV_107.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:16502: smṛtvā tu vacanaṃ devyāḥ pratyuvāca sakhīṃ tadā | *HV_107.44*1175 |
GE07hv_conpu:16504: smarāmi bhāmini vaco devyāḥ krīḍāgate bhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16505: yathoktaṃ sarvam akhilaṃ prāptaṃ harmyatale mayā // HV_107.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:16506: bhartā tu mama yady eṣa lokanāthasya bhāryayā /
GE07hv_conpu:16507: vyādiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ jñeyas tatra kāryaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_107.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:16508: ity evam ukte vacane kumbhāṇḍaduhitā punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16510: na hi tasya kulaṃ devi na kīrtir nāpi pauruṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:16511: kaścij jānāti tattvena kim idaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase // HV_107.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:16512: adṛṣṭaś cāśrutaś caiva dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tvayānaghe /
GE07hv_conpu:16513: kathaṃ jñeyo bhaved bhīru so 'smābhī ratitaskaraḥ // HV_107.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:16515: rudatī prasabhaṃ bhuktā praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sakhi // HV_107.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:16516: na hy ayaṃ prākṛtaḥ kaścid yaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prasahya naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16518: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahaujasau /
GE07hv_conpu:16519: na śaktāḥ śoṇitapuraṃ praveṣṭuṃ bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_107.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:16521: purīṃ śāsati bāṇe tu jitvā śakraṃ śacīpatim | *HV_107.52*1176 |
GE07hv_conpu:16523: praviṣṭaḥ śoṇitapuraṃ bāṇam ākramya mūrdhani // HV_107.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:16525: ko nu nāma jagaty asmin manaḥ kartuṃ mahāsure | *HV_107.53*1177:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16526: śāsaty etat puraṃ devi manuṣyo jīvitaspṛhaḥ | *HV_107.53*1177:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16527: praviśet tam avajñāya bāṇaṃ kiṃ vāpi dharṣaṇam | *HV_107.53*1177:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16529: kas tasyā jīvitenārtho bhogair vā syāc chubhekṣaṇe // HV_107.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:16530: dhanyāsy anugṛhītāsi yasyās te patir īdṛśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16531: prāpto devyāḥ prasādena pārvatyā mattakāśini // HV_107.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:16532: idaṃ tu te kāryatamaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai mayeritam /
GE07hv_conpu:16533: vijñeyo yasya putras tu yan nāmā yat kulaś ca saḥ // HV_107.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:16534: ity evam ukte vacane tatroṣā kāmamohitā /
GE07hv_conpu:16538: uvāca kumbhāṇḍasutāṃ kathaṃ jñāsyāmahe sakhi // HV_107.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:16540: tvam eva cintaya sakhi nottaraṃ pratibhāti me | *HV_107.57*1179:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16541: svakārye muhyate loko yathā jīvaṃ labhāmy aham || *HV_107.57*1179:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16542: uṣāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmā vākyam idaṃ punaḥ | *HV_107.57*1179:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16545: apsarā citralekhā vai kṣipraṃ vijñāpyatāṃ sakhi || *HV_107.57*1179:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16546: asyāḥ sarvam aśeṣeṇa trailokyaṃ viditaṃ sadā || *HV_107.57*1179:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16548: tām apsarasam ānāyya citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām | *HV_107.57*1179:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16551: sā tac chrutvā tu vacanam uṣāyāḥ parikīrtitam | *HV_107.57*1180:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16553: tataḥ sā cintayāviṣṭā vacanaṃ prāha durvacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16554: citralekhām apsarasaṃ praṇayāt tāṃ sakhīṃ sakhī // HV_107.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:16555: paramaṃ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi bhāmini /
GE07hv_conpu:16556: bhartāraṃ yadi me 'dya tvaṃ nānayiṣyasi matpriyam // HV_107.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:16558: tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ priyān prāṇāṃs tataḥ kamalalocane // HV_107.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:16559: vikralekhābravīd vākyam uṣāṃ tāṃ hasatī śanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16560: naiṣo 'rthaḥ śakyate 'smābhir vettuṃ bhāmini suvrate // HV_107.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:16562: na kulena na varṇena na śīlena na rūpataḥ | *HV_107.61*1181:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16563: na deśataś ca vijñātaḥ sa hi coro mayā sakhi | *HV_107.61*1181:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16564: kiṃ tu śakyam idaṃ kāryaṃ buddhipūrvaṃ mayā sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16565: prāptuṃ tac chṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathā kāmam avāpsyasi // HV_107.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16570: ye viśiṣṭāḥ prabhāvena rūpeṇābhijanena ca // HV_107.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16571: yathāpradhānāṃs tān sarvān ālikhiṣyāmy ahaṃ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16572: manuṣyaloke ye cāpi pravarā lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_107.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:16573: saptarātreṇa te bhīru darśayiṣyāmi tān aham /
GE07hv_conpu:16574: tato vijñāya paṭṭasthaṃ bhartāraṃ pratilapsyase // HV_107.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:16576: na darśaye yadi sakhi tarhi vahnim ahaṃ viśe | *HV_107.65*1183 |
GE07hv_conpu:16577: [k: Ds1 cont.: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds2 D1-6 T4 G1.2.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16579: kriyatām evam ity āha citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām || *HV_107.65*1184:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16581: ity uktvā saptarātreṇa kṛtvālekhyagatāṃs tu tān /
GE07hv_conpu:16582: citrapaṭṭagatān mukhyān ānayām āsa śobhanā // HV_107.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:16583: tataḥ prāstīrya paṭṭaṃ sā citralekhā svayaṃkṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16586: uṣāyā darśayām āsa sakhīnāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:16587: ete deveṣu ye mukhyās tathā dānavavaṃśajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16588: kiṃ naroragayakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:16591: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ye viśiṣṭatamā narāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16592: tad etān paśya sarvāṃs tvaṃ yathābhilikhitān mayā // HV_107.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:16593: yas te bhartā yathārūpo yathābhilaṣitaḥ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16594: taṃ tvaṃ pratyabhijānīhi svapne yaṃ dṛṣṭavaty asi // HV_107.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:16595: tataḥ krameṇa sarvāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā sā mattakāśinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16598: atītya ca yadūn sarvān dadarśa yadunandanam // HV_107.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:16600: balabhadram atho dṛṣṭvā pradyumnam atha sātyakim | *HV_107.71*1188:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16601: dadarśa yadusiṃhaṃ taṃ pautraṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ | *HV_107.71*1188:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16602: aniruddhaṃ raṇe ruddhaṃ pañcabāṇam iva sthitam || *HV_107.71*1188:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16603: paṭe sthitaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vīraṃ citrātmanā yadum | *HV_107.71*1188:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16605: abravīc citralekhāṃ tām ayaṃ coraḥ sa vai sakhi // HV_107.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:16606: yenāhaṃ dūṣitā pūrvaṃ svapne harmyagatā satī /
GE07hv_conpu:16607: so 'yaṃ vijñātarūpo me kutastyas taskaraḥ śubhe // HV_107.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:16609: guṇaśīlābhijanato nāma kiṃ cāsya bhāmini // HV_107.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:16614: [k: T1 G M G(ed.) ins. after the ref., T2 after 74: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16616: dānavānāṃ raṇe hantā viṣṇur jiṣṇur jagatpatiḥ || *HV_107.75*1190:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16622: bhartā tava viśālākṣi prādyumnir bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_107.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:16623: na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu sadṛśo 'sti parākrame /
GE07hv_conpu:16624: utpāṭya parvatān eṣa parvatair eva śātayet // HV_107.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:16626: tryakṣapatnyā samādiṣṭaḥ sadṛśaḥ sajjanaḥ patiḥ // HV_107.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:16628: yady enaṃ me viśālākṣi bhartāram amaropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:16629: [k: After the ref.,K1.3.4 Ñ2 V B D T4 G1.2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16630: tvam evātra viśālākṣi yogyā bhava varānane | *HV_107.78*1192:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16631: aśakyā hi gatiś cānyā agatyā me gatir bhava || *HV_107.78*1192:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16634: upāyaś cintyatāṃ bhīru apratarkyaṃ priye sukham | *HV_107.78*1192:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16636: bhaved āpatsu yan mitraṃ tan mitraṃ śasyate budhaiḥ | *HV_107.78*1192:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16637: kāmārtā cāsmi suśroṇi bhava me prāṇadhāriṇī | *HV_107.78*1192:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:16638: adya nānayasi kṣipraṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ śubhe // HV_107.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:16640: śrotum arhasi kalyāṇi vacanaṃ me śucismite // HV_107.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:16641: yathā bāṇasya nagaraṃ rakṣyate devi sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16642: dvārakāpi tathā bhīru durādharṣā viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:16643: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16650: na ca śakyam avijñātaiḥ praveṣṭuṃ dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16652: nānuyokṣyasi māṃ devi sāhase 'smiṃs tu karmaṇi | *HV_107.81ab*1194:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16653: tato virama buddhiṃ tvaṃ duḥprāpāt svapnavastunaḥ | *HV_107.81ab*1194:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16654: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva pitaraṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:16657: [k: Ś1 M4 om. the ref. After the ref. Ñ (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G1.2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16659: kiṃ me bahuvilāpena śrūyatāṃ sakhi kāraṇam | *HV_107.82*1195:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16660: yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yāsyāmi yamasādanam // HV_107.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:16661: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16662: dūtam āsādya kāryāṇāṃ siddhir bhavati bhāmini | *HV_107.82*1196:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16663: tasmād dautyena me gaccha jīvantīṃ māṃ yadīcchasi | *HV_107.82*1196:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16664: yadi tvaṃ me vijānāsi sakhyaṃ premṇā ca bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:16665: kṣipram ānaya me kāntaṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi vā priyān // HV_107.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:16666: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16667: jīvitasya hi saṃdehaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva kulasya ca | *HV_107.83*1197:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16668: kāmārtā hi na paśyanti dūṣaṇaṃ vai kulasya ca || *HV_107.83*1197:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16670: tvaṃ ca śaktā viśālākṣi dvārakāyāḥ praveśane | *HV_107.83*1197:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16671: saṃstutāsi mayā bhīru kuru me priyadarśanam | *HV_107.83*1197:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16673: eṣā gacchāmy ahaṃ bhīru praviśya dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16674: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5 T4 G2.4.5 ins. after the ref.; D4 cont. after 1197*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16676: kāritā ca samudyogaṃ priyaiḥ kāntaiś ca bhāṣitaiḥ | *HV_107.84*1198:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16677: bhartāram ānayāmy adya tava vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_107.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:16678: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16680: sā vacas tathyam aśivaṃ dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham /
GE07hv_conpu:16683: uktvā cāntarhitā kṣipraṃ citralekhā manojavā // HV_107.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:16684: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16685: sakhībhiḥ sahitā hy ūṣā cintayantī sthitā tu sā | *HV_197.85*1201 |
GE07hv_conpu:16686: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā naṣṭā bāṇapurāt tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16687: [k: Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D2.6 T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16691: dadarśa dvārakāṃ caiva divi tāreva saṃsthitām // HV_107.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:16697: [k: After the ref., all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 33). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16700: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D1-5 ins. after App. I (No. 33); D6 after 1ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16707: dadarśa bhavanaṃ yatra prādyumnir avasat sukham // HV_108.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16709: tataḥ praviśya sahasā bhavanaṃ tasya tan mahat /

GE07hv_conpu:16712: dadarśa madhye nārīṇāṃ tārāpatim ivoditam // HV_108.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:16714: pibantaṃ madhu mādhvīkaṃ śriyā paramayā yutam /
GE07hv_conpu:16716: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D (except D3) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16717: vādyate samatālaṃ ca gīyate madhuraṃ tathā | *HV_108.3*1205:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16718: na ca tasya manas tatra tam evārtham acintayat || *HV_108.3*1205:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16719: striyaḥ sarvaguṇopetā nṛtyante tatra tatra vai | *HV_108.3*1205:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16720: na cāsya manasas tuṣṭiṃ citralekhā prapaśyati | *HV_108.3*1205:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16721: na cābhiramate bhogair na cāpi madhu sevate | *HV_108.3*1205:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:16722: vyaktam asya hi tat svapnaṃ hṛdaye parivartate | *HV_108.3*1205:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:16723: iti tatraiva buddhyā ca niścitā gatasādhvasā | *HV_108.3*1205:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16725: [k: After line 3, K1 Ñ2 B1 D6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16728: kathaṃ kāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ svasti bhaven mama // HV_108.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:16730: tāmasyā chādayām āsa vidyayā śubhalocanā // HV_108.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:16732: utpapāta gṛhītvā sā prādyumniṃ yuddhadurmadam // HV_108.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:16735: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16740: [k: G2.4.5 cont. (T1.2 G1.3 M ins. after 7; T4 after line 2 of *1206): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16741: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā prāptā bāṇapuraṃ tadā | *HV_108.7*1207:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:16743: evam uktā tadā kanyā bāṇasya duhitā tataḥ | *HV_108.7*1207:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16745: praveśayām āsa tadā saṃprāptaṃ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // HV_108.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:16750: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1 D1.2) T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16751: sā harmyasthā tam arghyeṇa yādavaṃ samapūjayat | *HV_108.9ab*1209:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16753: tvaritā kāminī prāha citralekhāṃ bhayāturā // HV_108.9 //

GE07hv_conpu:17344: senānīs tāta mā maivaṃ na devāḥ kṣudrakarmiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17345: nākṛtajñā na vā klībā nāvaliptā na bāliśāḥ // HV_109.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:17346: devatārthaṃ ca me yatno mahān dānavasaṃkṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:17347: teṣāṃ priyārthaṃ ca raṇe hanmi dṛptān mahāsurān // HV_109.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:17348: tatparas tanmanāś cāsmi tadbhaktas tatpriye rataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17349: kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyanti vijñāyaivaṃvidhaṃ hi mām // HV_109.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:17351: na teṣu pāpaṃ vijñeyaṃ bāliśa tvaṃ prabhāṣase // HV_109.50 //

GE07hv_conpu:17353: kadācid iha puṃścalyā aniruddho hṛto bhavet | *HV_109.50*1269:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17358: na vaktavyam idaṃ pāpaṃ tvadvidhena yadūttama | *HV_109.50*1270 |
GE07hv_conpu:17361: yac chakrasya prabhoḥ kāryaṃ tad asmākaṃ viniścitam /
GE07hv_conpu:17362: asmākaṃ cāpi yat kāryaṃ tac ca kāryaṃ śacīpateḥ // HV_109.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:17363: saṃrakṣyāś ca vayaṃ devair asmābhiś cāpi devatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17364: devatārthe vayaṃ cāpi mānuṣatvam upāgatāḥ // HV_109.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:17369: nāyaṃ devair na gandharvair nāpi yakṣair na rākṣasaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17370: pradyumnaputro 'pahṛtaḥ puṃścalyā tu hṛtaḥ striyā // HV_109.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:17372: tābhir hṛto na saṃdeho nānyato vidyate bhayam // HV_109.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:17374: [k: After 57a, K Ñ2 V B D T4 G2.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17379: madhuraḥ śrūyate śabdo mādhavasya niveśane // HV_109.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:17380: te carāḥ sarvataḥ sarve sabhādvāram upāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17381: śanair gadgadayā vācā idaṃ vacanam abruvan // HV_109.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:17382: udyānāni śilāḥ śailā guhā nadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17383: ekaikaṃ śataśo rājan mārgitaṃ na ca dṛśyeta // HV_109.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:17385: anye kṛṣṇaṃ carā rājann upāgamya tadābruvan | *HV_109.59*1273:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17386: sarve no viditā deśāḥ prādyumnir na ca dṛśyate | *HV_109.59*1273:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17388: te 'pi śāntimanaskā hi gamayeyuḥ kathaṃ ca naḥ | *HV_109.59*1274 |
GE07hv_conpu:17390: tadājñāpaya naḥ kṣipram aniruddhasya mārgaṇe // HV_109.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:17392: anyonyam abhyabhāṣanta kim ataḥ kāryam uttaram // HV_109.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:17394: kecic cācintañ śūrā āsthāya bhrukuṭiṃ narāḥ // HV_109.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:17398: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D2.3.6 T4 cont. (G2 ins. after 62ab, G4.5 after 62): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17399: aniruddhaḥ kutaś ceti saṃbhramaḥ sumahān abhūt | *HV_109.62*1276 |
GE07hv_conpu:17400: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D2.3.6 cont. (K Ñ1 V1 Dn D1.4.5 cont. after 1275): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17402: tāṃ niśāṃ vimanaskās te gamayeyuḥ kathaṃcana || *HV_109.62*1277:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17403: aniruddho hṛtaś ceti punaḥ punar ariṃdama | *HV_109.62*1277:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17404: evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ teṣāṃ prabhātā rajanī tadā | *HV_109.62*1277:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:17405: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17409: kiṃ mayā kāryam ity eva kuto nu bhayam āgatam | *HV_109.63*1278:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17410: sarvathā yatnam āsthāya yatiṣye kāryam uttaram || *HV_109.63*1278:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:17412: yatrāsau sthitavān pautro gamiṣyāmy aham adya vai || *HV_109.63*1278:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:17413: prathamaṃ kāṃ diśaṃ yāsye kena syāc chrūyate 'khilam | *HV_109.63*1278:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:17414: yadi kaścid vijānīyāt tadā tu sukṛtaṃ bhavet | *HV_109.63*1278:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:17417: praviveśa sabhām eko nāradaḥ prahasann iva // HV_109.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:17419: dṛṣṭvā tu yādavān sarvān kṛṣṇena saha saṃgatān | *HV_109.64*1279 |
GE07hv_conpu:17420: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D1.5.6 cont., K Ñ3 V D2-4 T4 G4.5 ins. after 64: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17424: madhuparkaṃ ca gāṃ caiva nāradāya dadau prabhuḥ // HV_109.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:17428: utsāhanāśāt sarve vai klībā iva vicetasaḥ // HV_109.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:17430: atīte divase vīre yādavā adbhutaṃ mahat | *HV_109.67*1281 |
GE07hv_conpu:17431: evam ukte tu vacane nāradena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17432: vāsudevo 'bravīd vākyaṃ śrūyatāṃ bhagavann idam // HV_109.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:17433: aniruddho hṛto brahman kenāpi niśi suvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:17435: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 (G2.4.5 after 67) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17436: eṣa te yadi vṛttāntaḥ śruto dṛṣṭo 'pi vā mune || *HV_109.69*1282:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:17437: bhagavan kathyatāṃ sādhu priyam etan mamānagha | *HV_109.69*1282:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17438: ity evam ukte vacane keśavena mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:17439: prahasya nāradaḥ prāha śrūyatāṃ madhusūdana // HV_109.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:17441: aniruddhasya caikasya bāṇasya ca mahāmṛdhe // HV_109.71 //

GE07hv_conpu:17449: baṇena māyām āsthāya baddho nāgair mahābalaḥ // HV_109.74 //

GE07hv_conpu:17452: dṛṣṭam etan mayā viṣṇo prādyumner yuddham īdṛśam | *HV_109.74*1284:2 |

GE07hv_conpu:17454: vyādiṣṭas tu vadhas tasya bāṇena garuḍadhvaja | *HV_109.74*1285:1 |

GE07hv_conpu:17456: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 G4.5 cont. (Ś1 Ñ1 ins. after 74): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17458: bāṇena māyām āsthāya sarpair niyamanaṃ kṛtam | *HV_109.74*1286:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:17459: uttiṣṭhatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yaśase vijayāya ca /

GE07hv_conpu:17461: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17462: prāṇaiḥ kiṃcid gatair vīro dhairyam ālambya tiṣṭhati | *HV_109.75*1287 |
GE07hv_conpu:17463: ity evam ukte vacane vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_conpu:17464: prāyātrikān vai saṃbhārān ājñāpayata vīryavān // HV_109.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:17467: tataś candanacūrṇaiś ca lājaiś cāpi samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17468: niryayau sa mahābāhuḥ kīryamāṇo janārdanaḥ // HV_109.77 //

GE07hv_conpu:17472: smaraṇaṃ vainateyasya kṛṣṇa tvaṃ kartum arhasi /

GE07hv_conpu:17480: samāhvayasva govinda sa hi tvāṃ tatra neṣyati | *HV_109.80ab*1291 |

GE07hv_conpu:17484: kṛṣṇakeśaḥ pravalayo jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś ca varṇataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17490: sahasram iva sūryāṇāṃ dīpyamānaḥ prakāśate // HV_109.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:17491: yaḥ prabhur bhāti bhūtātmā bhūtānāṃ bhāvanaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17492: yasyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ dadau prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_109.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:17499: gamanāya matiṃ cakre vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_109.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:17500: āsthito garuḍaṃ devas tasya cānu halāyudhaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:17505: na hi te pramukhe sthātuṃ kaścic chakto mahāmṛdhe // HV_109.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:17506: prasāde te dhruvā lakṣmīr vijayaś ca parākrame /

GE07hv_conpu:19830: iti narapatir ātmavāṃs tadāsau tad anuvicintya babhūva vītamanyuḥ // HV_118.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:19832: iti nṛpatir adīnavikramas tad anuvicintya babhūva nirvṛtaḥ | *HV_118.42*1589 |
GE07hv_conpu:19833: idaṃ mahākāvyam ṛṣer mahātmanaḥ paṭhan nṛṇāṃ pūjyatamo bhaven naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19834: prakṛṣṭam āyuḥ samavāpya durlabhaṃ labheta sarvajñaphalaṃ ca kevalam // HV_118.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19835: śatakratoḥ kalmaṣavipramokṣaṇaṃ paṭhan idam mucyati kalmaṣān naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19836: tathaiva kāmān vividhān samaśnute samāptakāmaś ca cirāya nandati // HV_118.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:19837: yathā hi puṣpaprabhavaṃ phalaṃ drumāt tataḥ prajāyanti punaś ca pādapāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19838: tathā maharṣiprabhavā imā giraḥ pravardhayante tam ṛṣiṃ pravartitāḥ // HV_118.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19839: putrān aputro labhate suvarcasaś cyutaḥ punar vindati cātmanaḥ sthitim /
GE07hv_conpu:19840: vyādhiṃ na cāpnoti ciraṃ ca bandhanaṃ kriyāṃ ca puṇyāṃ labhate guṇānvitaḥ // HV_118.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:19841: patim upalabhate ca satsu kanyā śravaṇam upetya śubhā munes tu vācaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19842: janayati ca sutān guṇair upetān ripujanamardanavīryaśālinaś ca // HV_118.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:19843: vijayati vasudhāṃ ca kṣatravṛttir dhanam atulaṃ labhate dviṣajjayaṃ ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19844: vipulam api dhanaṃ labhec ca vaiśyaḥ sugatim iyāc chravaṇāc ca śūdrajātiḥ // HV_118.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:19845: purāṇam etac caritaṃ mahātmanām adhītya buddhiṃ labhate ca naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07hv_conpu:19846: vihāya duḥkhāni vimuktasaṅgaḥ sa vītarāgo vicared vasuṃdharām // HV_118.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:19847: ity etad ākhyānam udāhṛtaṃ vaḥ pratismaranto dvijamaṇḍaleṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:19848: sthairyeṇa jātena punaḥ smarantaḥ sukhaṃ bhavanto vicarantu lokam // HV_118.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:19849: iti caritam idaṃ mahātmanām ṛṣikṛtam adbhutavīryakarmaṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:19850: kathitam idaṃ hi samāsavistaraiḥ kim aparam icchasi kiṃ bravīmi te // HV_118.51 //
